sentences.en: But it was unclear if her murder was a reprisal for the pope's remarks.
sentences.cn: 但还不清楚凶手是否是出于对教皇言论的报复.

sentences.en: Civilian targets were bombed in reprisal ( for the raid ).
sentences.cn: 轰炸了民用目标作为 ( 对曾受袭击的 ) 报复.

sentences.en: Civilian targets were bombed in reprisal.
sentences.cn: 轰炸了民用目标作为报复.

sentences.en: Hand , being greatly hurt in his pride, contemplated only severe reprisal.
sentences.cn: 韩德的自尊心受到严重伤害, 一心一意考虑着严厉的报复.

sentences.en: Rumour had it ( that ) he was killed in a reprisal raid in the local area.
sentences.cn: 谣传 他在当地的一次报复性袭击中丢了命.

sentences.en: The assassination was in reprisal for invasion.
sentences.cn: 刺杀行动是为了报复敌人入侵.

sentences.en: The professor, who teaches Web security, asked not be named for fear of reprisal.
sentences.cn: 这位不愿透露姓名的教授, 任教的科目为网络安全.

sentences.en: The professor, who teaches Web security, asked not to be named for fear of reprisal.
sentences.cn: 这位教授教的课程是网站安全, 因为担心被报复,所以要求匿名.

sentences.en: They bombed civilian targets in reprisal.
sentences.cn: 他们炮轰平民目标作为报复.

sentences.en: They bombed the enemy villages in reprisal for the killing some of their own troops.
sentences.cn: 他们轰炸敌人的村庄作为对他们一些士兵杀戮的报复.

sentences.en: They didn’t tell the police for fear of reprisal .
sentences.cn: 由于害怕报复，他们没有报警。

sentences.en: We self - censor our thoughts for fear of reprisal.
sentences.cn: 因为害怕会有严重的后果,我们自行审查我们言行.

sentences.en: We should be able to present religious opinions openly, without fear of censure or reprisal.
sentences.cn: 我们应该能够公开表达信仰上的观点, 而无需害怕责难或者报复.

words.tran_cn: 重复；（从地产每年收入中扣除的）年金

trans.tran_cn: 报复（行为），（特指国家间的）暴力性报复，报复行为，[史]（对敌国人民，财产的）报复性劫掠，〈罕〉赔偿，赔款
trans.tran_en: something violent or harmful which you do to punish someone for something bad they have done to you
